channel.title: Real Life on Flavio Castelli
channel.description: Recent content in Real Life on Flavio Castelli

item.title: No more exams!
item.description: Just a small announcement: last month (by 14th september) I’ve finished all my exams!! Obviously I’m really happy but I’m also really busy because I’m working hard on strigi. I’ll let you know something more about it in these days…
